characterDescription:
Khav is a darkeyed Alethi farmer from Hearthstone. He is amongst the boys that Kaladin addresses at the foot of a hill in a field where they should've been worming. (Farmers usually went over their hills three or four times, fertilizing as they went.)
Khav pursues Naget's question of Kaladin regarding darkeyes becoming lighteyes by pressing Kaladin for more information than that which he (Kaladin) has already revealed to Naget.
